## My Interactive Map

```{r}
library(leaflet)

m <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  setView(lng = 106.7699,
          lat = 10.8478,
          zoom = 12) %>%
  addMarkers(lng = 106.7699,
             lat = 10.8478,
             popup = "Thủ Đức, TP.HCM")
m
```
